Data Fields
rtc_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Real Time Clock (RTC)

RTC IO Attributes. More...

#include <rtc.h>

Detailed Description

This data structure defines the structure used with I_RTC_ATTR and I_RTC_SETATTR ioctl requests on the RTC. It is also used when opening the RTC.

Data Fields

u8 pin_assign
 
u8 clock
 
uint32_t freq
 

Field Documentation

u8 rtc_attr_t::clock

The source clock

uint32_t rtc_attr_t::freq

Calibration frequency for setting the pre-scalar

u8 rtc_attr_t::pin_assign

Always 0
